title: Shattered Sanctuary
description: Five stories of lives that have been shattered.In Surviving Bedlam, four individuals fight for their lives against the ghosts of the past.Follow Dillon Picard and Caryn DeLuca to the land of Enola, where they battle an ancient werewolf, in The Shadow of the Wolf.In The Shadow People, Cora Talbot takes on the voices in her head.Join Clarissa Atwater as she discovers the ghostly secrets at the Savill House, in Winter Storm.In The Long Goodbye, you'll take a ride with Melody Taylor to an old farmhouse where she comes face to face with her family's tragic past.
author: Shawna Platt (Angel Shadow)
